original_title: A Senior CIA officer for 30 years confirms the psychological operations they use overseas were turned against Donald Trump and the American People to keep Democrats in power  — The Donald
article_summary: A retired senior CIA officer has confirmed that psychological operations used overseas were allegedly turned against Donald Trump and the American people to maintain Democratic power. This claim, made in a recent post, suggests that propaganda was used on news and airwaves to manipulate public opinion, a practice enabled by the repeal of the Smith-Mundt Act in 2013. The post has sparked discussions about the need to revoke or restore the act, with some users tracing societal issues to its passing.</s>
